pages.text: Bone can now be knapped into tools, just as rocks can.
$(thing)Bone Fish Hooks$() can be knapped from bones, and can then be crafted into $(thing)Bone Fishing Rods$().
$(l:tfc:mechanics/sewing_tables)Bone Needles$() are also knapped from bone and can be used to sew hides together.
Bone Needles can also be crafted from $(thing)Sabertooth Fangs$(), which are dropped by $(l:tfc:the_world/wild_animals#predators)$(thing)Sabertooths$().
Bones can also be knapped into $(l:tfc:bsa/arrowheads)Arrowheads$().
